best_gem_comment: This course was fantastic and almost too easy. The material is fascinating and the professor was engaging and dedicated as a teacher. I say too easy because we only had five problem sets, no section, and at times that made me feel like I would've understood some of the material better if we'd had a little more resources / work on it. But I really appreciated the way Prof. Singerman tailored the material to the group and our interests, even in such a large class. Overall such a wonderful gem. This is the type of class that very concretely changed my understanding of the world, the type I would bring up fun facts from in conversation.

A chill and fantastic intro to semantics, from someone who did not have a linguistics background. The course is accessible, fun, and has deep connections to concepts in CS/math/logic. The instructor is also super sweet and helpful, truly a gem!
best_gem_comment_short: The instructor is also super sweet and helpful, truly a gem!
